item.description:
After some efforts, we finally settle down on Royal East Restaurant as our location for this meeting.  Thanks Fred Hapgood for making the reservation.

Notice the start time: 7:00 pm (We will potentially have some folks attending the Neuphi meeting back in BU.  Patricia Churchland is giving a talk that day. That will give people enough time to travel to Cambridge from BU)

Kar
item.how_to_find_us: Royal East Restaurant, 792 Main Street Cambridge, MA 02139-3510
item.why: It is phenomenon in which the brain knows something but the person does not. A person can therefore react like a zombie.

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Discussion of Blindsight based on "Seeing Red" by Nicholas Humphrey
